job description:
Hi,

Good Afternoon,

Hope you are doing great.

We have an opportunity for Data Governance Analyst with one of our clients in Long Beach, CA.

Please see the job details below and let me know if you would be interested in this role.

If interested, please send me a copy of your updated resume, your contact details, your availability and a good time to connect with you.

Position: Data Governance Analyst

Location: Long Beach, CA

Duration: 6 12 months

Visa status: ANY

Job Description:
  • Standup the Data Governance Council
    • Establish meetings frequency, agendas, record keeping, etc.
    • Vet policies discussions and approvals
    • Operational readiness policy oversight
    • Data quality improvement logs via JIRA introduction, training, monitoring and reassignments, follow-up to closure
    • And more
  • Mature metadata management practice and procedures
    • Catalog management
    • Centralize glossary (includes definitions, rules)
    • Dictionaries technical, business and operational
    • Lineage
    • Coordinate and collaborate with Information Delivery team
    • Metadata, MDM, Ref data policies oversight
    • Traceability and transparency
    • And more
